statements: DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 200 AND access_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE accessed_data LIKE '%confidential%' AND access_time > '2022-01-01' AND access_time < '2022-02-01';
DELETE FROM sensitive_access_logs WHERE user_id = 100 AND accessed_table = 'sensitive_table';
DELETE FROM sensitive_access_logs WHERE user_id = 123 AND accessed_table = 'customers';
DELETE FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_type = 'credit_card' AND access_count < 10;
DELETE FROM sensitive_access_logs WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_type = 'ID') AND access_timestamp < '2021-09-01';
DELETE FROM sensitive_data_access_log WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM access_permissions WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_credentials WHERE last_login < '2021-12-01');
DELETE FROM users WHERE id = 5 AND email = 'test@example.com';
DELETE FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_owner = 10 AND access_level = 'high';
